constraint.description: Terraform does not handle egress rules correctly if the last egress rule is deleted from the aws_securoty_group. Use aws_security_group_rule instead
constraint.cypher: MATCH (n:Terraform) WHERE n.type = 'aws_security_group' AND EXISTS(n.egress) RETURN n;

constraint.description: Terraform does not handle ingress rules correctly if the last ingress rule is deleted from the aws_securoty_group. Use aws_security_group_rule instead
constraint.cypher: MATCH (n:Terraform) WHERE n.type = 'aws_security_group' AND EXISTS(n.ingress) RETURN n;
